quotes.title: Give me place to stand, I will move the earth
quotes.author: Archimedes

quotes.title: Give me place to stand, I will move the mars
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.title: If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.title: We write to taste life twice, in the moment and in retrospect.
quotes.author: Ana√Øs Nin

quotes.title: One day I will find the right words, and they will be simple.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac, The Dharma Bums

quotes.title: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.title: Read a thousand books, and your words will flow like a river..
quotes.author: Lisa See
